nodes.text: Dantum Roohd was a male human senator who served in the Galactic Senate during the Clone Wars. During the war, Roohd was part of the Council of Neutral Systems, an outlier political wing of the Pacifist Faction in the senate. He was later part of a small group of senators who wished to stop a vote on the Enhanced Privacy Invasion Bill and attended a meeting of those that opposed the bill at the Senate Building which was interrupted when the bounty hunter Cad Bane took the attendees hostage.
